mapper.select: SELECT C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, C.MEMBER_PHONE, C.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.BUSINESS_LICENSE, A.SELLER_DATE FROM TBL_SELLER A JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE A.SELLER_APPROVAL IN '승인대기' GROUP BY (C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, C.MEMBER_PHONE, C.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.BUSINESS_LICENSE, A.SELLER_DATE) ORDER BY A.SELLER_DATE ASC OFFSET #{startRow} -1 ROWS FETCH NEXT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) ROWS ONLY

SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER A
WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ searchId }
